newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Applied Microbiology buy repeated.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Applied Microbiology buy repeated.

text.p: -- Madison Research said Friday it reiterated its buy recommendation on Applied Microbiology Inc with a six- to 12-month price target of 12-5/8.
-- Applied Microbiology shares were unchanged at 4-1/4.
-- It noted that Applied Microbiology recently reported fiscal 1996 revenues of $16.0 million, up 37 percent from 1995 revenues of $11.7 million and ahead of Madison's projections.
-- The loss for the year was $0.24 a share, larger than expected, compared with a profit last year of $0.02. The company attributed the loss to product launch expenses.
-- Madison said it lowered its 1997 estimate to break-even from a profit of $0.09 a share because of higher selling, general and administrative expenses.
